home.ifyouhaveaccount: or if you already have an account
home.introduction: Metatocome is a Hyper-Automation engine online service which can be used to automate everything in an organization that can be automated. Developers can build advanced wokflow based applications that dispatch tasks to both human and computer systems with any modern computer languages.

features.engine: Metatocome's core component is an advanced hyper-automation Engine running in the cloud. Developers can design, run, monitor workflow processes on this site, or develop fully customized UIs with the support of Metatocome APIs.
features.hyper: Metatocome can automate the process of any sort of entities, no matter they are human or computer system, from a integrated enterprise perspective. these entities take the role of "workers", Staff get their work instructions from worklist, system provide API endpoints Metatocome engine will call.
features.easy: Integrate workflow into your application, web-based, iOS or Android APP, with SDK of any modern computer language.
features.secure: Metatocome take the role of a pure collaboration engine running separatedly from other systems, and has separated authentication, and access control from enterprise's internal IT system. Metatocome use resource URI to refer to any internal or external IT resources.

getstart.title: Get Started
getstart.content: Whether you're new to BPM or an experienced user, it's easy to learn and use Yarknode

tool.POINTER: click select, click and hold move, shift-clickproperties, shift-movemulti-select, numtool, Ctrl-Emode
tool.ACTION: clickanywhere to place a task node, Esc to quite this mode
tool.INFORM: click place an INFORM node for sending email(s) notifications
tool.SCRIPT: click place an SCRIPT node for embedding Javascript program in workflow
tool.TIMER: click place a TIMER node for controlling time
tool.SUB: click place a SUB node for running sub-process or another standalone process
tool.AND: click place an AND node for continueing only when previous tasks are all done
tool.OR: click place an OR node for continuing after any previous task is done
tool.GROUND: click place an GROUND node for end here without following
tool.CONNECT: clickClick two nodes to connect them, hold SHIFT for contineous linking, Esc or double-click on blank area to cancel
tool.THROUGH: click place an THROUGH node, for cotinueing a long route, no effect to process flow logic

banner.title: NVIDIA Omniverse Enterprise
banner.subtitle: Develop industrial metaverse applications with OpenUSD.

introduction.title: Connect, Build, and Operate 3D Pipelines and Virtual Worlds
introduction.abstract:
Metaverse and 3D internet applications are here, and with them come highly complex production pipelines, geographically dispersed teams, and a vast collection of incompatible software tools and siloed data.

From designing true-to-reality 3D assets and environments to operating large-scale digital twins, NVIDIA Omniverse™ Enterprise and Universal Scene Description (OpenUSD) help teams overcome the challenges of physically accurate, large-scale simulations and demanding AI, industrial, and scientific workflows.

visualization.title: Scalable Visualization and Simulation
visualization.abstract: Create physically accurate visualizations and simulations of products and environments, reducing the time and costs of physical testing.

developer.title: Easy-to-Use Suite of Developer Tools
developer.abstract: Quickly create and deploy custom workflows and apps without extensive programming knowledge. Use foundation apps to get started and focus on design and building.

ecosystem.title: Ecosystem of Application Building Blocks
ecosystem.abstract: ​​Use Omniverse's rich catalog of industry-leading third-party extensions to integrate your team's tools seamlessly with proven applications and connectors.

ai.title: Built-In AI
ai.abstract: ​​Embed AI into your workflows to automate repetitive tasks with predictive capabilities and natural language processing.

architecture.title:
Architecture, Engineering,
Construction, and Operations
architecture.abstract: The design, construction and operation of buildings and infrastructure pose complex challenges. To overcome these challenges, architecture, engineering, construction and operations (AECO ) companies around the world are using NVIDIA technology to optimize design, reduce risk and improve collaboration, even when working remotely. With breakthroughs in collaborative solutions such as AI, 3D graphics virtualization, virtual reality (VR) , and NVIDIA Omniverse™, many companies are altering workflows to reshape the future of our world.

details.title: Speed up the design workflow
details.content: Advanced technologies such as immersive VR, real-time light tracking, and 3D graphics virtualization have greatly improved the design and visualization of BIM models, as well as the efficiency and level of innovation.

details.title: Implement data-driven decisions
details.content: With GPU-powered data science and AI, the AECO team can use a wealth of data-including design, environment, simulation and structure-to gain insight into everything from traffic flow to weather conditions.

details.title: To ensure safety and to maximize cost savings
details.content: GPU-assisted AI and robotics support self-driving vehicles on the construction site, enabling real-time monitoring of on-site safety compliance and automated, more accurate infrastructure inspection processes.

entertainment.title:
Media and
Entertainment
entertainment.abstract: The film and television industry is innovating and reshaping its production processes to meet the growing demand for high-quality content, while maintaining a tight pace of work across a worldwide workforce. In addition, there is a growing demand for continuous publishing and refreshing of streaming services to meet a growing subscriber base. As a result, studios are turning to AI, virtual production, real-time rendering, and content collaboration, whether on desktops or in data centers or in the cloud, to significantly speed up production.

details.title: Speed up your 3D workflow
details.content: Omniverse, as a collaboration hub, can interconnect existing 3D workflows, upgrading linear processes to real-time synchronous authoring, enabling you to leverage the common scenario description (OpenUSD) format, create in a way and at an unprecedented speed.

automotive.title: Automotive
automotive.abstract: Nvidia's automotive solutions offer superior performance and scalability for designing, visualizing, and simulating future driving. Build virtual showrooms and car configurators, develop in-car AI assistants, and validate self-driving technology-all with the help of Nvidia AI Omniverse and accelerated computing platforms.

details.title: Design visualization
details.content: From concept to collaboration to final design, reshaping the future of the automotive industry.

details.title: Engineering simulation
details.content: Improve performance with advanced computing power, scalability, and reliability.

details.title: Industrial Digital Twins
details.content: Create accurate virtual representations powered by Omniverse Enterprise.

details.title: Virtual showrooms and vehicle configurators
details.content: Create an immersive retail experience using virtual reality and augmented reality.

details.title: Self-driving and parking
details.content: Large-scale implementation of more intelligent software defines self-driving cars.

manufacturing.title: Manufacturing
manufacturing.abstract: Using breakthroughs in design, rendering, simulation, production, remote collaboration, and visualization to revolutionize product development, transform engineering, and power the factories of the future.

details.title: Product Development
details.content: Change the work flow of product development.

details.title: Ai-enabled factory
details.content: Improve plant agility, efficiency and productivity.

visualization.title: Science and Research
visualization.abstract: NVIDIA Omniverse™ provides researchers with a shared virtual space where they can quickly view, analyze, discover and publish scientific breakthroughs through real-time collaboration and simplified workflow.

details.title: Real-time collaboration
details.content: Using Omniverse, researchers everywhere can visualize, analyze, and modify the same data, and collaborate in real time to improve productivity.

details.title: Large-scale interactive visualization
details.content: Omniverse can be extended to provide real-time interactive visualizations of large volumes of 2D data, enabling researchers to quickly and intuitively scan the entire data set for faster discovery.

details.title: Vivid visual effects
details.content: Omniverse supports 3D geometry and advanced light tracking to create realistic visuals and highlight insights that may be lost in 2D data.
